bug.question: I have six legs and I can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make honey!
🐝 I have yellow and black stripes.
🌷 I like to collect nectar.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and I fly around. People say I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 Some people think I bring good luck.
🔴 I am usually red.
⚫ I have spots.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass. I'm green and I have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I make a chirping sound.
🟢 My color is like grass.
🦵 I have long legs for jumping.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🍂 I carry things that are bigger than me.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ People are sometimes afraid of me.
🍽️ I like to eat flies and other bugs.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then I go into a chrysalis. When I come out, I have wings! What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am very colorful when I grow up.
🐛 I eat a lot of leaves when I am young.
🌷 I like to drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I have many legs and a long body. I crawl on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more than 20 legs.
🌿 I like to hide under rocks and logs.
🍂 I eat dead leaves and insects.

bug.question: I live in the ground and build hills. Sometimes I bite! What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am related to ants, but I can sting!
🔥 My bite feels like fire!
🏜️ I live in a colony underground.

bug.question: I can glow in the dark. I am a bug that flies around at night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I use my light to find a friend.
🌃 You see me mostly at night.
🟢 I have a green light.

bug.question: I am a beetle that is very strong and can carry heavy things. I roll dung into a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 💩 I eat and roll animal waste.
💪 I am known for my strength.
🌍 I live in Africa and other warm places.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of lots of water!
🚢 Boats float on top of me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. Who am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have many arms to grab with.
🐙 I can squirt ink when I'm scared.
🪨 I like to hide among the rocks.

ocean.question: I'm a home for sea creatures, and I'm very colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I'm made of tiny animals!
🐠 Fish like to swim around me.
☀️ I need sunlight to grow.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm a type of snail!
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🍃 I like to eat plants in the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with pointy teeth. People are sometimes afraid of me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I'm known as a predator.
🌊 I swim in all oceans.
🦷 I have many rows of sharp teeth.

ocean.question: I'm a very small fish, and I have a horse-like head. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to hold onto seaweed.
🐴 I'm named after a farm animal.
🤰 The daddy carries the babies!

ocean.question: I can sting you with my tentacles, and I float in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ I'm often found at the beach.
😵‍💫 My sting can hurt.
💧 I'm mostly made of water.

ocean.question: I'm a giant mammal that sings and lives in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm the biggest animal on Earth!
🎶 I communicate with songs.
🌬️ I breathe air through a blowhole.

ocean.question: I crawl along the bottom and have a hard shell on my back. I can also live for a very long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs on the beach
🥬 I like to eat seagrass.
🕰️ I'm very slow and live for many years.

ocean.question: I am a fish that lives in the ocean and looks like a flattened disk. I can also give an electric shock. Who am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ My shock can stun other fish.
🥏 I'm flat and round like a pancake.
🌊 I live on the bottom of the ocean.
